parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword of the zone name. The search is not case-sensitive. You can set the SearchMode parameter to switch between exact search and fuzzy search. The default mode is fuzzy search.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: QueryRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the VPC that is associated with the zone.

parameters.name: QueryVpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC that is associated with the zone.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the zone belongs.

parameters.name: ResourceTag
parameters.description: The resource tags that are added to the zone.

parameters.name: SearchMode
parameters.description:
The search mode. This parameter takes effect only when the Keyword parameter is specified. Valid values:

- **LIKE**: fuzzy search (default)

- **EXACT**: exact search

Default value: **LIKE**.

parameters.name: ZoneTag
parameters.description: The list of cloud service types.

parameters.name: ZoneType
parameters.description:
The type of the zones to query. Valid values:

- **AUTH\_ZONE**: authoritative zones.

- **CLOUD\_PRODUCT\_ZONE**: zones for cloud services.

Default value: **AUTH\_ZONE**.
